[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpycrilqsx[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA one-byte stack buffer overflow was detected by AddressSanitizer during a fuzzing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrun of the Mongoose codebase. The overflow occurs in the function [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min printf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which is ultimately invoked via `mg_vxprintf`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min fmt.c. The error arises when a write exceeds the bounds of a local buffer on the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack while formatting output, leading to an “AddressSanitizer: [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow” crash.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue description  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  When processing certain inputs under the Mongoose HTTP parser fuzz harness, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer reports a stack-buffer-overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`. The [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow is triggered by a write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m to an address just past the end of a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-allocated array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The crash stack trace [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshows the error originating in the print formatting logic, propagating through [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_snprintf`, `mg_vxprintf`, and finally to `mg_http_parse` when the fuzzer’s test[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction invokes the HTTP parser.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  This is a stack-based buffer overflow within the printf/fmt formatting routines [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof the Mongoose codebase.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Important observations and findings  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • AddressSanitizer classifies the error as a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write beyond the right [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredzone of a stack buffer.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifically overrunning the local array labeled ‘tmp371’.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The crash arises while formatting data for logging [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_log`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m during HTTP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_http_parse`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The root trigger is a fuzzer input delivered via `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtest/fuzz.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exercising the HTTP parser and formatting routines.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The sanitizer output includes redzone and shadow-memory details, pinpointing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe exact buffer and overflow location.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code areas to investigate for a holistic view  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. fmt.c: Function `mg_vxprintf`, including all local buffer declarations [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the logic that computes write positions.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. printf.c: The I/O buffer handler functions such as `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static` that perform the actual writes.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. log.c: The `mg_log` routine that invokes the formatting code and may propagate[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted strings into I/O buffers.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. http.c: The `mg_http_parse` function that calls `mg_log` and provides the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontext in which formatted logging is invoked.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. test/fuzz.c: The LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput harness to understand how arbitrary [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minputs reach the HTTP parser and exercise the formatting path.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Analysis Report[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Relevant Code Snippets[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_snippets>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m322[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m323[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Identify and confirm the root cause:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a fixed‐size local buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is too small for the output of `mg_dtoa`.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` writes more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msign, decimal point, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m fractional digits, exponent marker, exponent sign and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, causing a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte overflow into the stack redzone.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Outline patch steps to correct buffer sizing without altering existing logic:[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Choose a safe buffer size:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Worst‐case `%e` formatting for a `double` has:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ optional sign: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m character  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ one digit before the decimal point: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ decimal point: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ precision digits: [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ exponent marker [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`e` or `E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ exponent sign: [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m exponent digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble exponent range ±[0m[1;36m308[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ‑ [0m[1;39m([0m[39moptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m null terminator if `mg_dtoa` writes one internally  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Total = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m17[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m bytes.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Round up to a power of two or a round figure; e.g., [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes to cover any [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuture precision changes.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. In fmt.c, within the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf`:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor a macro like `char [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mMG_DTOA_EBUF_LEN[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` with `#define MG_DTOA_EBUF_LEN [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - No change to the call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`—preserve the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting behavior and precision of [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Because `mg_dtoa` returns the number of characters written and `scpy` only [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopies `k` characters, the larger buffer simply prevents overflow while maintaining[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctional output.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensure no other formatting branch is broken:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Search for other fixed‐size local buffers passed to `mg_dtoa` or similar [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroutines.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If any other local buffer is undersized, apply the same pattern [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincrease to [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m or use computed safe size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Keep the remaining code intact:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Do not modify `mg_dtoa`, `scpy`, or any harness/fuzzing code.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This one‐line buffer size increase preserves the existing formatting logic, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecimal precision, and performance characteristics, while eliminating the stack [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to public APIs, so existing tests and code depending on [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` and `mg_snprintf` remain valid.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Validation:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and run AddressSanitizer‐instrumented tests and fuzz harness.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that the previous stack‐buffer‐overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` no [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger occurs.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing regression tests to verify no unintended side effects.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Documentation & Code Hygiene:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add a brief comment above the new buffer declaration, such as:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       “[0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp buffer must be large enough for sign, [0m[1;35mmantissa[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, decimal [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpoint, exponent marker, sign, up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m exponent digits, and optional null. *[0m[35m/[0m[39m”[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, introduce a named constant [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`MG_DTOA_EBUF_LEN`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for clarity and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreuse if needed elsewhere.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Allocating [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes fully prevents any overflow from `mg_dtoa` with [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐digit [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecision and exponent formatting.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The change is local to one branch, does not affect other code paths, and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserves existing formatting behavior.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No modification to harness or external libraries is necessary.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar buffer‐size patterns already exist in other formatting branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%f` or `%g`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so the patch maintains internal consistency.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in the printf/fmt subsystem. The overflow occurs in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction mg_pfn_iobuf_private, invoked via mg_vxprintf when formatting [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfloating-point values using the ‘e’ or ‘E’ specifier. An attempted patch enlarged [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone local buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in src/fmt.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to accommodate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger formatted strings. After applying the patch, the same overflow is still [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreported at the same stack offset, indicating the fix did not cover all affected [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzz driver [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exercising HTTP parsing triggered an ASan [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror:  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  “stack-buffer-overflow on address … in mg_pfn_iobuf_private”  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Call stack highlights the overflow in mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when branch [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m is handled.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan points to a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write just past the end of a stack-allocated array named [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m‘tmp371’ [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe mg_vxprintf, offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Two local arrays in mg_vxprintf were identified:  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • tmp [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • tmp371 [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the latter being overflowed.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In src/fmt.c at the mg_vxprintf specialization handling ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’ [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround original [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the patch replaced:  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  with:  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp buffer must be large enough for sign, mantissa… exponent digits *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No other buffers were modified.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPost-Patch Log  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A second fuzz run under ASan reproduced the same overflow:  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ERROR: AddressSanitizer: stack-buffer-overflow on address … in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Same call chain through mg_putchar_iobuf_static → scpy → [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ASan again points to overflow of ‘tmp371’ at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the mg_vxprintf [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The full mg_vxprintf implementation in src/fmt.c, especially:  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • All local buffer declarations [0m[1;39m([0m[39mboth tmp and tmp371[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The logic in the ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’ formatting branch and calls to mg_dtoa.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The scpy helper that writes into these buffers and how width/precision [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameters are enforced.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction between format width/precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m‘w’, ‘pr’, ‘minus’[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msizes.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of mg_dtoa and any intermediate buffers it uses.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any other format-specifier branches that allocate fixed-size arrays on the stack.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m227[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer triggered an AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow in the Mongoose HTTP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibrary’s formatting code. The crash occurs in mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39minside scpy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvoked by mg_vxprintf when handling floating-point formats. The patch attempt [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincreased one temporary buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch within [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfmt.c. After applying the patch, the same overflow is still reported at the same [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack location, indicating the underlying buffer issue was not resolved.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A libFuzzer run reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow in mg_pfn_iobuf_private, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled from mg_vxprintf in src/fmt.c.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer backtrace shows the overflow writing beyond a local array in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe of mg_vxprintf.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Two local arrays are present in that frame [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and another unnamed buffer at a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlater offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow hits the second array [0m[1;39m([0m[39mshown as ‘tmp371’ in [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdiagnostics[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The failure occurs during HTTP parsing with mg_http_parse → mg_log → mg_vxprintf [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ mg_dtoa calls.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In fmt.c around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m, the patch changes:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Original: `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Patched:  `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The comment notes the need to accommodate sign, mantissa, decimal point, exponent[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmarker, sign, and up to three exponent digits.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding with the enlarged buffer, AddressSanitizer still reports the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame stack-buffer-overflow at mg_pfn_iobuf_private.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash log remains nearly identical, indicating overflow of the second local [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in mg_vxprintf.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The new log seed and module addresses differ, but the nature and location of the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror are unchanged.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The mg_vxprintf function in src/fmt.c, particularly the handling of `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting that declares two local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and the overflowed buffer at line[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The local object labeled ‘tmp371’ in the sanitizer report—its declaration size [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand usage in mg_vxprintf.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The mg_dtoa routine in fmt.c, which may write into one of these buffers.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction between scpy [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe helper that writes to the output buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m146[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:207[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m215[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Root Cause Analysis**  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a stack‐allocated buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp` was declared with size [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m after the last patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but the code called  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     thereby permitting `mg_dtoa`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_snprintf` to write up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes into a [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmaller array. This mismatch triggers a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte overflow into the next stack object [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow is not in the harness or external library—it's squarely in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting logic of `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Critical Logic to Preserve**  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The two‐stage floating‐point formatting:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calling `mg_dtoa` to format the normalized mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m decimal [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mplaces[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m emitting the ‘e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’E’ character,  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calling `mg_lld` to format the exponent—must remain intact.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to the harness, fuzzing logic, or test suite.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Patch Outline**  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. **Enlarge and match the buffer size constant**  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Choose a buffer size that comfortably fits the worst‐case mantissa string [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msign + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m digit + decimal point + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits = [0m[1;36m11[0m[39m chars, plus room for null [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and any intermediate writes.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - For safety and to mirror the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte internal `buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` in `mg_dtoa`, use [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. **Pass the real buffer length to `mg_dtoa`**  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace the hardcoded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, so `mg_snprintf` cannot [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexceed the actual array bounds.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. **Leave `mg_lld` invocation unchanged**  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `mg_lld` writes the exponent digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmax [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m characters for sign + up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m back into `tmp` and returns the count; with the enlarged buffer, it will be[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Detailed Steps**  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-       char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp must hold up to sign + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m digit + [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m fractional digits + NULL *[0m[35m/[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+       char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Pass real buffer size to prevent overflow *[0m[35m/[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp is large enough for exponent printing *[0m[35m/[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other format‐specifier branches require similar changes because other [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranches already use matching buffer sizes or dynamic lengths.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Justification**  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: Passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` ensures `mg_snprintf` never [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites past `tmp`’s end, eliminating the stack‐buffer‐overflow.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Correctness**: We maintain the two‐step formatting [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa + `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` + [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m unchanged, so the output format remains identical.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Non‐Intrusiveness**: We do not touch any fuzz harness, external libraries, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtest code, or unrelated utility functions. Existing tests and fuzz targets will [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontinue to operate and validate behavior.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Future‐Proofing**: Allocating up to [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor matching the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternal buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m leaves headroom if `mg_dtoa` logic evolves to produce slightly [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger mantissas or if formatting flags change.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Potential Side Effects and Mitigations**  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Larger Stack Frame**: `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` uses more stack space, but [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes is [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtrivial in this context and already exceeded by the internal `buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` inside [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Truncation**: By limiting `dstlen` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, if `mg_dtoa` ever [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproduces more than [0m[1;36m31[0m[39m visible characters, it will truncate. This matches typical [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`snprintf` semantics and avoids overflow. If full precision is needed beyond [0m[1;36m31[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacters, tests will catch it; at that point, the buffer size could be revisited.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Verification**  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the library with AddressSanitizer enabled and rerun the existing fuzz [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtarget. The previous stack‐buffer‐overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m should no longer occur.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests for `mg_dtoa`, `%e` formatting, and any JSON or HTTP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting tests to confirm no change in output formatting.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Optionally, add a regression test feeding a case that previously overflowed [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., a very small or very large double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and assert correct `[0m[32m"%e"[0m[39m` output without [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msanitizer violations.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/02/26 06:36:54][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=354840;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=274407;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
