[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          n++;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-       [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp buffer must be large enough for sign, mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecimal point,[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+               exponent marker, sign, up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m exponent digits and null terminator.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Pass real buffer size to prevent overflow *[0m[35m/[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            n++;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Bound exponent conversion too *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  This frame has [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;35mobject[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer crash exposed a one-byte stack-buffer overflow in the Mongoose [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting/printing code. The fuzzer log identified an overflow in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled via scpy → mg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a local stack buffer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m‘tmp371’[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m of size [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes was overrun by one byte. The attempted patch enlarged [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `tmp` buffer in the `%e/%E` handler from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes and updated the call to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_dtoa to pass the new buffer length. After rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same stack-buffer-overflow is still reported at the same stack frame and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvariable, indicating the patch did not prevent the overflow.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Invocation: The fuzzer drives `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which calls [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Crash symptom: AddressSanitizer flags a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write past the end of a stack [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fault location:  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • In mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m frame at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, object `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` named ‘tmp371’ [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mdeclared at fmt.[0m[1;92mc:319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow occurs when writing through the iobuf write function [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations:  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Two local arrays in mg_vxprintf: one at `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“tmp”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and one at [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“tmp371”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow consistently hits the second array, suggesting formatting logic [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor certain conversions writes at least [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m bytes into an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- File modified: src/fmt.c, within the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the patch context[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Changes:  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Replaced `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` with `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` and updated the comment to [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreflect needed capacity.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Changed the call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Patch context:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```diff[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  --- a/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +++ b/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   @@ [0m[1;36m-315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m11[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m @@[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  -           char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* tmp buffer must be large enough for sign, mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecimal point,[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +              exponent marker, sign, up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m exponent digits and null [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminator. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +           char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  -          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Pass real buffer size to prevent overflow *[0m[35m/[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  +          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             n++;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Rebuilt and reran the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m runs; the AddressSanitizer report is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical:  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • ASan shows the same buffer layout [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `tmp371` at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith overflow at byte [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The unchanged size of ‘tmp371’ in the compiled code implies the patch did not [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maffect that variable or the crash now occurs in another instance of an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther investigation  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and resolve formatting-related overflows, review:  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The definition and layout of mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`, `tmpNNN`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and their fixed sizes.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic for each conversion specifier [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`, `%f`, `%g`, integer, string, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39metc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The implementation of mg_dtoa:  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it uses the provided buffer length argument.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether it guards against writing the null terminator and exponent suffix.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The scpy function and the iobuf mechanisms in printf.c:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How they handle multiple writes into a single output buffer.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Other branches in mg_vxprintf that may declare small fixed-size buffers and call[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_dtoa or similar routines.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply the previous patch to enlarge the `%e/%E` branch’s local buffer and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdate the `mg_dtoa` call:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor a similarly safe size, e.g. [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change the `mg_dtoa` invocation to pass the real buffer length:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Fix the unbounded integer‐to‐string routine `mg_lld`:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change its signature from[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     to[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, size_t buf_len,[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                         int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inside `mg_lld`, add bounds checks on every write to `buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and always [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull‐terminate:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Before writing any character [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpos++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = …`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ensure `pos + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < buf_len`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • After finishing digit/sign writes, set `buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpos[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Return the actual number of characters written [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexcluding the terminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcapped at `buf_len - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Update all calls to `mg_lld` in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand any other branches in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to pass the buffer length:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch, replace[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     with[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similarly, for `%d`, `%u`, `%x` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor any other specifier that invokes [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ensure the caller uses a sufficiently large local buffer and passes its [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` into `mg_lld`.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Audit other fixed‐size buffers in `mg_vxprintf`:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any local array used for numeric conversion [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., small `tmp` buffers in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%f`, `%g`, or integer branches[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must be large enough to hold the maximum possible [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput plus the null byte.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If such arrays remain at [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes or similar, increase them [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. to [0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdate their conversion calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to use the real buffer length.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Ensure `mg_dtoa` always null‐terminates [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit already takes a length argument [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Review its implementation to verify it never writes past the declared length [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand always leaves a trailing `[0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m` when the requested output length is less than [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer size.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Regression and fuzz testing:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the initial codebase with the above changes.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the existing fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for sufficient [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39miterations to confirm the AddressSanitizer no longer reports a [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack‐buffer‐overflow.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add unit tests for edge‐case numbers: [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Very large positive and negative exponents near ±[0m[1;36m308[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfor `%e/%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Very large integers near [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m‐bit limits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfor `%d`, `%u`, `%x`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Verify the printed output matches expectations and that no buffer corruption [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow stemmed from two issues: the small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte `tmp` buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39monly patched[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the unbounded `mg_lld`, which blindly wrote digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand no null [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mterminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into that same buffer.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Enlarging the buffer alone is not sufficient unless the integer formatter also [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrespects buffer boundaries.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adding a length parameter to `mg_lld` and guarding its writes eliminates any [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpossibility of it overwriting past the end of the caller’s buffer.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This approach preserves existing formatting logic, touches only `fmt.c`, and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mavoids any changes to harness, tests, or external libraries.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- By auditing all numeric‐conversion branches in the same way, we prevent similar [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflows elsewhere in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Potential side effect: if someone attempts to format an exponent or integer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlonger than the buffer allows [0m[1;39m([0m[39mextremely large values[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the output will be [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated. However, we choose a buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m comfortably larger than any [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent or integer length realistically encountered for IEEE‐[0m[1;36m754[0m[39m doubles [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mexponents ≤[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m‐bit integers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≤[0m[1;36m20[0m[39m digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so truncation should not [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccur under normal use.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After validation, this patch closes the one‐byte overflow without altering the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpublic API or test expectations.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m[01/02/26 06:46:10][0m[2;36m [0m[1;31mERROR   [0m PoV found:                                                                           ]8;id=95007;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=510327;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py#102\[2m102[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         + shift                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -v TESTCASE [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mTESTCASE[0m=[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                 [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                    [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         vm.mmap_rnd_bits = [1;36m28[0m                                                                [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           int64_t v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned long[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned long[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mv, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           int v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j < xl && w > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w--;[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m334[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m20[0m[39m @@[0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzing harness triggered an AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose codebase during formatting in `mg_vxprintf`. The error occurs in [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled by `scpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when writing past a small local buffer in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`. A patch was applied to enlarge one buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` → `char [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and to pass the buffer size into `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld`. After rebuilding[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand rerunning the fuzzer, the same stack-buffer-overflow recurred in `mg_vxprintf`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that the patch did not fully address the overflow.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - While running `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, AddressSanitizer reported a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstack-buffer-overflow, scarity [0m[1;36m46[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack highlights `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` ← `scpy` ← `mg_vxprintf` ← [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ← `mg_log` ← `mg_http_parse`.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow address fell in the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m. [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWithin that frame, two local arrays exist:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • ‘tmp’ at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • ‘tmp371’ at bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     The write extended one byte past `tmp371`’s end.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No root‐cause was altered by fuzzer harness; it merely exercises the HTTP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing and logging code that invokes `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c` at the branch handling `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the small [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer declaration  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     was replaced with  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calls to `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` were updated to accept `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` as an [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicit capacity parameter:  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This change was intended to prevent overrunning `tmp` during conversion and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure the formatting routines respect buffer bounds.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Post-Patch Results  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuilding and rerunning the same fuzzer input produced an identical [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer report:  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Overflow still detected in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` via `scpy`.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Overflow location remains at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the `mg_vxprintf` frame, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the offending buffer is still only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes long in the compiled code [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, unchanged by the patch.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The report again shows two local objects in that frame, with the second [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m‘tmp371’[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m spanning [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The write lands at byte [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, one byte past that [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The definition and sizing of both local buffers in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines near [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m247[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, especially the one at offset [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“tmp371”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremains too small for some formatted output.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All formatting code paths in `mg_vxprintf` that invoke `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, or[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy`, to confirm they use correct buffer sizes and bounds checks.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `scpy` and how it computes and enforces length limits [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbased on format parameters.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other branches in `mg_vxprintf` that allocate fixed-size buffers for [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnumeric or string formatting, ensuring they match the worst-case output length plus[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma terminator.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:    mul = [0m[1;36m0.1[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul <= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, t = mul * [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; i < width; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate exponent, and [0m[32m'mul'[0m[39m for scientific representation[0m                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul >= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul *= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e++;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && d [0m[35m/[0m[39m mul < [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m mul [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m, e--;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m" --> %g %d %g %g\n"[0m[39m, saved, e, t, mul[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m:    while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mt >= [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m && n + s < [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, t [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10.0[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < len; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#if MG_ENABLE_CUSTOM_LOG[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Let user define their own [0m[1;35mmg_log_prefix[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m[1;35mmg_log[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:#else[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_log_prefix[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint level, const char *file, int line, const char *fname[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:  const char *p = [0m[1;35mstrrchr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfile, [0m[32m'/'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m41[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mp == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p = [0m[1;35mstrrchr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfile, '\\'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:  n = [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m"%-6llx %d %s:%d:%s"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_millis[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, level,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:                  p == NULL ? file : p + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, line, fname[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m' '[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, n - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_log[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *fmt, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:  va_list ap;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mva_start[0m[1;39m([0m[39map, fmt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms_log_func, s_log_func_param, fmt, &ap[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mva_end[0m[1;39m([0m[39map[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"\r\n"[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
