[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:static unsigned char [0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:  return [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc < [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m ? c + [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m : c + [0m[32m'W'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:#define [0m[1;35mISPRINT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mx[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m >= [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m <= [0m[32m'~'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:  const unsigned char *p = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst unsigned char *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:  unsigned char ascii[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, alen = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:  size_t i;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < len; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mi % [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Print buffered ascii chars[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"  "[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ascii, [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'\n'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, alen = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Print hex address, then \t[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mi >> [0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mi >> [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mi >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"   "[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mnibble[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Two nibbles, e.g. c5[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[32m' '[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;                                         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Space after hex number[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:    ascii[0m[1;39m[[0m[39malen++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;35mISPRINT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? p[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m : [0m[32m'.'[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Add to the ascii buf[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39malen < [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"   "[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ascii[0m[1;39m[[0m[39malen++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m' '[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"  "[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogs[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ascii, [0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mlogc[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'\n'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/http.[0m[1;92mc:317[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m350[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:        return [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_http_parse[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used to parse both HTTP requests and HTTP[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m responses. If HTTP response does not have Content-Length set, then[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m body is read until socket is closed, i.e. body.len is infinite [0m[1;39m([0m[39m~[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m For HTTP requests though, according to[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[4;94mhttp://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-8.1.3,[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m only [0m[1;33mPOST[0m[39m and [0m[1;33mPUT[0m[39m methods have defined body semantics.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Therefore, if Content-Length is not specified and methods are[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m329[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m not one of [0m[1;33mPUT[0m[39m or [0m[1;33mPOST[0m[39m, set body length to [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m330[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m331[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m So, if it is HTTP request, and Content-Length is not set,[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m332[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m and method is not [0m[1;39m([0m[1;33mPUT[0m[39m or [0m[1;33mPOST[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m then reset body length to zero.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m333[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->body.len == [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && !is_response &&[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m334[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_strcasecmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->method, [0m[1;35mmg_str[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"[0m[1;33mPUT[0m[32m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m &&[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m335[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_strcasecmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->method, [0m[1;35mmg_str[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"[0m[1;33mPOST[0m[32m"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m336[0m[39m:    hm->body.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m337[0m[39m:    hm->message.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m req_len;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m338[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m339[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m340[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m The [0m[1;36m204[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mNo content[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m responses also have [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m body length[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m341[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->body.len == [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m && is_response &&[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m342[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_strcasecmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->uri, [0m[1;35mmg_str[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"204"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m343[0m[39m:    hm->body.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m344[0m[39m:    hm->message.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m req_len;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m345[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m346[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhm->message.len < [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m req_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Overflow protection[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m347[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m348[0m[39m:  return req_len;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m349[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m350[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of Root Causes[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow arises from two local fixed‐size buffers in mg_vxprintf:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m A [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` used for most numeric conversions.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m An [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` used specifically for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The initial patch enlarged only the `%e` buffer and updated the `mg_dtoa` call[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut did not address:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The persistent [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that still overflows.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The `mg_lld` routine, which lacks a capacity parameter and any bounds [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking, leading to overruns when formatting large exponents or integers.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy to Fix[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Enforce Safe Formatting in Both dtoa and lld[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Redefine `mg_lld` to take a destination buffer length:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Change signature from  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           to  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, size_t buf_len, int64_t val, bool [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Inside `mg_lld`, before each write to `buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, check `s + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m < buf_len`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIf writing would overflow, stop digit‐insertion early.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. After digit generation, always null‐terminate within bounds:  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms < buf_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m; else buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mbuf_len - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Return the number of characters written [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexcluding the terminator[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Enlarge and Unify Local Temporaries in mg_vxprintf[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Replace `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` with a larger buffer, e.g. `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor [0m[1;36m64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto be ultra‐safe[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas done already[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Call `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, matching the new [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msignature.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In the general numeric branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m275[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m300[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, update all `mg_lld` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvocations:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Locate calls at:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             • line ~[0m[1;36m283[0m[39m: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             • line ~[0m[1;36m286[0m[39m: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[33m...[0m[39m, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             • line ~[0m[1;36m289[0m[39m: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[33m...[0m[39m, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Change each to `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[39m, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Ensure the primary [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdeclared at line [0m[1;36m275[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is sufficiently [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarge for worst‐case integer output; [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes is typically ample for [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m‐bit [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintegers plus sign and hex digits.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Reapply and Consolidate Patches to Initial Codebase[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Reapply the earlier enlargement of `%e` buffer and `mg_dtoa` capacity [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparameter.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Introduce the new `mg_lld` signature and all matching call‐site updates in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Keep all other branches, format parameters, and scpy logic intact to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserve existing behavior.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adding explicit buffer‐length parameters to both conversion routines ensures [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mno branch can silently write past a stack buffer.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Enlarging the `%e` buffer removes the tiny [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte slot that was the immediate [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow target.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By limiting changes strictly to `fmt.c`, we avoid touching harness or external[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlibraries, and existing tests/harness logic remain unaffected.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach matches how `mg_dtoa` already guards its output and brings [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld` into parity.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Signature change for `mg_lld` must be internal to `fmt.c`. Since it is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`static`, there is no ABI impact.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Performance: extra branch checks in `mg_lld` are minimal and only affect very [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarge numbers [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrare in HTTP logging[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Regression: existing formatting behavior is preserved for all values that fit [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the newly sized buffers; truly excessive values are truncated rather than [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflowing.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. References in Codebase[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_dtoa` already uses a `dstlen` parameter and bounds‐checked `mg_snprintf` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch brings `mg_lld` into the same design pattern.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All `scpy` usage remains unchanged; it still stops at buffer length or [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnull‐terminator.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy fully parameterizing both converters and enlarging all local buffers in [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`, we eliminate every stack‐buffer‐overflow path while preserving [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting formatting functionality and fuzzing harness compatibility.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/02/26 06:46:19][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.END                      ]8;id=207256;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=176827;file:///home/user/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleted work directory:                                                              ]8;id=22441;file:///home/user/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=735013;file:///home/user/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#314\[2m314[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleted out directory:                                                               ]8;id=404298;file:///home/user/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=175326;file:///home/user/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#321\[2m321[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m               [2m               [0m
